analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CommonSale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#443-469):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(this,tokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#454)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#455)
	External calls sending eth:
	- multisigWallet.transfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#446-447)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stages (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#463-465)
	- stages (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#466)
	- totalInvested (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#456-461)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol:
	Contract CovestingToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#325-327)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	- token.transfer(foundersTokensWallet,foundersTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#579-580)
	- token.mint(this,bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#581-582)
	- token.transfer(bountyTokensWallet,bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0x528b165220a26565e00709cbaef7b88fc8600f81.sol#582-584)
	State variables written after the call(s):
